message: Let's start fair. I'll take 60%, you take 40%. What do you say?
You started with 60%, I'll take a bit more this round. Your turn to decide!
Let's compromise. I'll take 40% this time, you take 60%. This way, we both get something, and we can move on.
You're being generous, but I'll take even more this time. Your turn to decide!
Okay, I'm getting the sense you want a bigger share. I'll go down to 30%, but this is my final offer. What do you say?
You're getting desperate, and I'm getting greedy. Take it or leave it!
This is getting ridiculous.  I'm willing to go down to 20%, but I'm not giving you any more.  Take it or leave it.
